input.description: XML document conforming to the ConnectionDetails Concept that contains the information required to execute a command. Example: <BladeLogicConnectionDetail> <adapter-name>BladeLogic Adapter</adapter-name> </BladeLogicConnectionDetail>

output.description: Success status of the command. "true" if successfule, "false" otherwise.
If "success" is false then error message contains the corresponding error message if any.
Contains list of all ACL templates, with all ACL template properties included in the list.
Contains any debug message accompanying the adapter response.
Contains the output part of the adapter response.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <template-list> <xsl:for-each select="//line[starts-with(text(), 'Name:')]"> <template> <xsl:attribute name="name"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after(text(), ' ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:attribute> </template> <xsl:apply-templates select="following-sibling::line"> <xsl:with-param name="threshold"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="following-sibling::line[(starts-with(text(), 'Name:'))]"> <xsl:value-of select="following-sibling::line[(starts-with(text(), 'Name:'))]/@index" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="following-sibling::line[position() = last()]/@index + 1" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:apply-templates> </xsl:for-each> </template-list> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="line"> <xsl:param name="threshold" /> <xsl:if test="@index < $threshold"> <property> <xsl:variable name="var" select="normalize-space(text())" /> <role> <xsl:variable name="role-var"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="starts-with($var, 'Current Role')"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Current Role</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($var, ' ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="$role-var" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </role> <authorization> <xsl:variable name="auth-var"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="starts-with($var, 'Current Role')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after($var, 'Current Role ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after($var, ' ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="$auth-var" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </authorization> </property> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This command returns a list of all ACL templates, with all ACL template properties included in the list.
